title: getting bugsplat
body: Every game I've been playing at the end when the nexus is about to explode I get a sudden dc then bugsplat comes up every game. I have repaired my league and it hasn't done anything to fix it. So... I keep getting bugsplat at the end of like every game when the nexus is about to explode. Someone help why is my client doing this?

replies.body: What OS are you on, and what are your computer specs? Do you know how to run a DirectX diagnosis?
i5-4440 CPU @ 3.10GHz, 3101 Mhz, nvidia gtx 750 ti, windows 8.1

Oh wow that's really close to my setup.

Have you tried downloading their latest drivers from [their site](http://www.nvidia.com/content/global/global.php)(Choose the region your card was produced in; if in doubt select USA)?

What are you having trouble with, exactly? Just visit the site and download the drivers. If you'd like, I can provide direct instructions.

Click the link, and then click USA/Canada. Click "DRIVERS" at the top. Do either Option 1 or Option 2. Download and install the correct drivers.
